scripts.android: yarn --cwd ../networking build && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && react-native run-android
scripts.android-win:
yarn run build --prefix ..
etworking & robocopy ..
etworking\lib .
ode_modules\@righton
etworking\lib /e /njh /njs & robocopy ..
etworking\src .
ode_modules\@righton
etworking\src /e /njh /njs & robocopy ..
etworking\ .
ode_modules\@righton
etworking package.json /njh /njs & react-native run-android
scripts.ios: yarn --cwd ../networking build && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 14'
scripts.apk: yarn --cwd ../networking build && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.fastlane: yarn --cwd ../networking build && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && cd ios && fastlane ios beta
scripts.reload: adb shell input keyevent 82 && adb shell input keyevent 66 && adb shell input keyevent 66
scripts.debug: adb shell input keyevent 82 && adb shell input keyevent 61 && adb shell input keyevent 66 && adb shell input keyevent 66
scripts.start: yarn --cwd ../networking build && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@righton/networking && rsync -r ../networking/lib ../networking/src ../networking/package.json ./node_modules/@righton/networking && react-native start
